infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library to let you select a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to your camera to let you take a profile photo.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location to provide location-based features.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow this app to access your photos to let you choose and upload a profile picture.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow this app to access your camera so you can take a profile photo directly.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow this app to access your location to provide location-based features and personalized content.
